author: dblevins
msg: Updates related to recent jndi changes.  Component JNDI paths are now "comp/env" rather than just "env".

author: jbellis
msg: rename stageOrderedCompaction -> getCompactionBuckets.  clean up code to make the algorithm more clear, and to allow grouping with more than just the previous bucket.  add getCompactionBucketsTest
